  • fusilli.train.store_trained_model
  • View page source

fusilli.train.store_trained_model

store_trained_model(trained_model, trained_models_dict)[source]

Stores the trained model to a dictionary. If model type is already in dictionary (e.g. if it’s a kfold model), append the model to the list of models.

Parameters:

  • trained_model (pytorch lightning model) – Trained model.

  • trained_models_dict (dict) – Dictionary of trained models.

Returns:

trained_models_dict – Dictionary of trained models.

Return type:

dict
